mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO problem_solving ( problem_id, member_id, submit_answer, is_correct, points, date ) VALUES
( #{item.problemId}, #{item.memberId}, #{item.answer}, #{item.isCorrect}, #{item.points}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT ps.member_id AS memberId, m.member_name AS memberName, SUM(ps.points) AS totalPoints, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(ps.points) DESC) AS rank, ps.date::date AS date FROM problem_solving ps LEFT OUTER JOIN members m ON ps.member_id = m.member_id WHERE ps.is_deleted = FALSE AND ps.date::date = #{date} GROUP BY ps.member_id, m.member_name, ps.date::date;

SELECT p.difficulty AS difficulty, p.title AS title, p.contents AS content, ps.submit_answer AS submitAnswer, p.correct_answer AS correctAnswer, ps.is_correct AS isCorrect, ps.points AS points FROM problem_solving ps LEFT OUTER JOIN problems p ON ps.problem_id = p.problem_id WHERE ps.date::date = #{date} AND ps.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY ps.date DESC
